metadata.title: CVE-2019-14248 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In libnasm.a in Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14.xx, asm/pragma.c allows aNULL pointer dereference in process_pragma, search_pragma_list, andnasm_set_limit when "%pragma limit" is mishandled.

criterions.comment: nasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
